28 visualization_msgs::Marker& createGeometryMarker(visualization_msgs::Marker& marker, const urdf::Geometry& geom,
29  const urdf::Pose& pose, const urdf::Color& color) {
30  rviz_marker_tools::makeFromGeometry(marker, geom);
31  marker.pose.position.x = pose.position.x;
32  marker.pose.position.y = pose.position.y;
33  marker.pose.position.z = pose.position.z;
34  marker.pose.orientation.w = pose.rotation.w;
35  marker.pose.orientation.x = pose.rotation.x;
36  marker.pose.orientation.y = pose.rotation.y;
37  marker.pose.orientation.z = pose.rotation.z;
38  marker.color.r = color.r;
39  marker.color.g = color.g;
40  marker.color.b = color.b;
41  marker.color.a = color.a;
42  return marker;
43 }
44 
45 const urdf::Color& materialColor(const urdf::ModelInterface& model, const std::string& material_name) {
46  static urdf::Color default_color;
47  if (default_color.r == 0.0f) {
48  default_color.r = 0.8f;
49  default_color.g = 0.0f;
50  default_color.b = 0.0f;
51  default_color.a = 1.0f;
52  };
53  urdf::MaterialSharedPtr material;
54  if (!material_name.empty())
55  material = model.getMaterial(material_name);
56  return material ? material->color : default_color;
57 }

86  return element.material_name;

90  static std::string empty;

94 std::vector<std::string> linkNames(const std::vector<const moveit::core::LinkModel*>& link_models) {
95  std::vector<std::string> names;
96  names.reserve(link_models.size());
97  for (const moveit::core::LinkModel* link : link_models)
98  names.push_back(link->getName());
99  return names;
100 }
101 
104 template <class T> // with T = urdf::Visual or urdf::Collision
105 void generateMarkers(const moveit::core::RobotState& robot_state, const MarkerCallback& callback,
106  const std::vector<std::string>& link_names = {}) {
107  const std::vector<std::string>* names =
108  link_names.empty() ? &robot_state.getRobotModel()->getLinkModelNames() : &link_names;
109  const urdf::ModelInterfaceSharedPtr& model = robot_state.getRobotModel()->getURDF();
110  if (!model)
111  return;
112 
113  visualization_msgs::Marker m;
114  m.header.frame_id = robot_state.getRobotModel()->getModelFrame();
115 
116  // code adapted from rviz::RobotLink::createVisual() / createCollision()
117  for (const auto& name : *names) {
118  const urdf::LinkConstSharedPtr& link = model->getLink(name);
119  if (!link)
120  return;
121 
122  bool valid_found = false;
123  auto element_handler = [&](const T& element) {
124  if (element && element->geometry) {
125  createGeometryMarker(m, *element->geometry, element->origin, materialColor(*model, materialName(*element)));
126  m.pose = rviz_marker_tools::composePoses(robot_state.getGlobalLinkTransform(name), m.pose);
127  callback(m, name);
128  valid_found = true;
129  }
130  };
131 
132  // either we have an array of collision/visual elements
133  for (const auto& element : elements_vector<T>(*link))
134  element_handler(element);
135 
136  // or there is a single such element
137  if (!valid_found)
138  element_handler(element<T>(*link));
139  }
140 }
141 
142 void generateCollisionMarkers(const moveit::core::RobotState& robot_state, const MarkerCallback& callback,
143  const std::vector<std::string>& link_names) {
144  generateMarkers<urdf::CollisionSharedPtr>(robot_state, callback, link_names);
145 }
146 void generateCollisionMarkers(const moveit::core::RobotState& robot_state, const MarkerCallback& callback,
147  const std::vector<const moveit::core::LinkModel*>& link_models) {
148  generateMarkers<urdf::CollisionSharedPtr>(robot_state, callback, linkNames(link_models));
149 }
150 
151 void generateVisualMarkers(const moveit::core::RobotState& robot_state, const MarkerCallback& callback,
152  const std::vector<std::string>& link_names) {
153  generateMarkers<urdf::VisualSharedPtr>(robot_state, callback, link_names);
154 }
155 void generateVisualMarkers(const moveit::core::RobotState& robot_state, const MarkerCallback& callback,
156  const std::vector<const moveit::core::LinkModel*>& link_models) {
157  generateMarkers<urdf::VisualSharedPtr>(robot_state, callback, linkNames(link_models));
158 }

162 void generateMarkersForScene(const planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr& scene, const MarkerCallback& callback) {
163  generateMarkers<urdf::VisualSharedPtr>(scene->getCurrentState(), callback);
164  generateMarkersForObjects(scene, callback);
165 }
